examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following journals were entered dated 2019-04-01 -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31
examples.full_description: VAT de-registration on Invoice Basis when creating journal sets Creating a VAT affecting journal set after de-registering for VAT Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following journals were entered dated 2019-04-01 -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31

examples.full_description: VAT de-registration on Invoice Basis when creating journal sets Creating a VAT affecting journal set before de-registering for VAT Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following journals were entered dated 2019-03-31 -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31

examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given the company starts using FreeAgent on 2019-05-01 -> And its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following opening balances were entered -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31

examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given the company starts using FreeAgent on 2019-05-01 -> And its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following journals were entered dated 2019-05-01 -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31
examples.full_description: VAT de-registration on Invoice Basis when creating journal sets Creating a VAT affecting journal set when the company de-registered for VAT before their FreeAgent start date Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2019-01-01 -> And the company is Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And it is VAT registered from 2019-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2019-12-31 -> Given the company starts using FreeAgent on 2019-05-01 -> And its VAT status changes to de-registered with an effective de-registration date of 2019-03-31 -> When the following journals were entered dated 2019-05-01 -> Then the company ledger entries for 818 (VAT Reclaimed) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 817 (VAT Control) are: -> And the company ledger entries for 819 (VAT Charged) are: -> And there are no VAT affecting sales tax effects after 2019-03-31
Cashflow::Actions::InvoicesAtRiskAction.component_class returns the correct component
Cashflow::Actions::InvoicesAtRiskAction given future invoices #weight returns 2 (medium)
Cashflow::Actions::InvoicesAtRiskAction given future invoices #show? returns true
Cashflow::Actions::InvoicesAtRiskAction given no future invoices #show? returns false
Close a client with active client where the accountancy practice has a trial sale should allow closure
Close a client with active client who is in their free period should allow closure
Close a client with active client whose free period has expired should allow closure
Close a client with active rbsg practice_managed client should allow closure
Close a client with active rbsg practice_managed demo client should not allow closure
Close a client as a non-senior account manager close a client

Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? when nominal_code is not in the chart of accounts is false
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money in when the nominal_code is not known to the account mapper is false
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money in when the nominal_code is a refund type is true
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money in when the nominal_code is not a refund type is false
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money out when the nominal_code is not known to the account mapper is false
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money out when the nominal_code is a payment type is true
Banking::Banquo::SuggestionFilter.can_be_suggested? for money out when the nominal_code is not a payment type is false
